thread.title: Will Lady Gaga Take on Trump at the Super Bowl? Place Your Bets!
thread.title_full: Will Lady Gaga Take on Trump at the Super Bowl? Place Your Bets! - WSJ

author: Hannah Karp
title: Will Lady Gaga Take on Trump at the Super Bowl? Place Your Bets!
text:
It’s not the outcome of Sunday’s Super Bowl that has the oddsmakers confused—the New England Patriots have been steady three-point favorites. The betting line they’re waffling on is whether Lady Gaga will make a spectacle during the halftime show.
The pop star has a history of outspokenness on social issues and has already once taken aim at Donald Trump. On Election night, she climbed onto a sanitation truck outside Trump Tower in...
